form.description: Comprehensive monitoring of Heating, Hot Water, Cold Water, and Energy systems

search.query: index=utilities sourcetype=kamstrup:heating | stats earliest(heat_energy) as start_energy, latest(heat_energy) as end_energy | eval consumption_kwh = (end_energy - start_energy) * 1000 | eval display_value = round(consumption_kwh, 1) | fields display_value

index=utilities sourcetype=kamstrup:hotwater | stats earliest(volume) as start_volume, latest(volume) as end_volume | eval consumption_m3 = end_volume - start_volume | eval consumption_liters = consumption_m3 * 1000 | eval display_value = round(consumption_liters, 0) | fields display_value

index=utilities sourcetype=elster:coldwater | stats earliest(current_value) as start_today, latest(current_value) as current_reading | eval liters_today = current_reading - start_today | eval display_value = round(liters_today, 0) | fields display_value

index=summary_utilities sourcetype=energy_metrics earliest=-10m | where isnotnull(rolling_avg_power) | stats latest(rolling_avg_power) as power_watts | eval display_value=round(power_watts, 0) | fields display_value

index=utilities sourcetype=kamstrup:heating | stats latest(power) as current_power, latest(flow) as current_flow, latest(temp1) as supply_temp, latest(temp2) as return_temp | eval delta_t = round(supply_temp - return_temp, 1) | eval power_active = if(current_power > 0.5, 1, 0) | eval flow_active = if(current_flow > 0, 1, 0) | eval temp_diff_active = if(delta_t > 5, 1, 0) | eval heating_score = power_active + flow_active + temp_diff_active | eval valve_status = if(heating_score >= 2, "OPEN", "CLOSED") | eval status_icon = if(valve_status == "OPEN", "ğŸŸ¢ OPEN", "âš« CLOSED") | eval power_indicator = if(power_active == 1, "âœ“ Power (" + tostring(round(current_power, 1)) + " kW)", "âœ— Power") | eval flow_indicator = if(flow_active == 1, "âœ“ Flow (" + tostring(round(current_flow, 3)) + " mÂ³/h)", "âœ— Flow") | eval temp_indicator = if(temp_diff_active == 1, "âœ“ Temp Î” (" + tostring(delta_t) + "Â°C)", "âœ— Temp Î”") | table status_icon, power_indicator, flow_indicator, temp_indicator | rename status_icon as "Valve Status", power_indicator as "Power", flow_indicator as "Flow", temp_indicator as "Temperature"

| makeresults | eval utilities="ğŸ”¥ Heating,ğŸ’§ Hot Water,ğŸš° Cold Water,âš¡ Energy" | makemv delim="," utilities | mvexpand utilities | eval sourcetype=case( utilities=="ğŸ”¥ Heating", "kamstrup:heating", utilities=="ğŸ’§ Hot Water", "kamstrup:hotwater", utilities=="ğŸš° Cold Water", "elster:coldwater", utilities=="âš¡ Energy", "emonpi:energy", 1=1, "unknown" ) | join type=left sourcetype [search index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:*, elster:*, emonpi:*) earliest=-1h latest=now | stats count as message_count, latest(_time) as last_seen, latest(wifi_rssi) as signal_dbm, latest(running_firmware_version) as firmware by sourcetype] | eval time_since=if(isnull(last_seen), 999999, now() - last_seen) | eval status=case( isnull(last_seen), "ğŸ”´ NO DATA", time_since < 120, "ğŸŸ¢ ONLINE", time_since < 600, "ğŸŸ¡ DELAYED", 1=1, "ğŸ”´ OFFLINE" ) | eval signal_quality=case( isnull(signal_dbm), "N/A", signal_dbm > -50, "Excellent", signal_dbm > -60, "Good", signal_dbm > -70, "Fair", 1=1, "Poor" ) | eval message_count=coalesce(message_count, 0) | eval last_seen_friendly=if(isnull(last_seen), "Never", strftime(last_seen, "%H:%M:%S")) | eval signal_dbm=if(isnull(signal_dbm), "N/A", tostring(signal_dbm)) | eval firmware=coalesce(firmware, "N/A") | rename utilities as utility | table utility, status, message_count, last_seen_friendly, signal_dbm, signal_quality, firmware

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:hotwater, elster:coldwater, kamstrup:heating) | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "Cold Water", sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "Heating", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | eval usage_value=coalesce(volume, current_value, pulse_count) | timechart span=1h latest(usage_value) as reading by utility

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:heating, kamstrup:hotwater, elster:coldwater) | eval flow_lph=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating" AND isnotnull(flow), flow * 1000, sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater" AND isnotnull(flow), flow * 1000, sourcetype=="elster:coldwater" AND isnotnull(water_used_last_minute), water_used_last_minute * 60, 1=1, null() ) | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "Cold Water", sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "Heating", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | timechart span=10m avg(flow_lph) as avg_flow by utility

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:heating, kamstrup:hotwater) | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "Hot Water", sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "Heating", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | timechart span=10m avg(power) as avg_power by utility

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:*) (temp1=* OR temp2=*) | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "Heating", sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "Hot Water", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | eval temp_type_supply=utility + " Supply" | eval temp_type_return=utility + " Return" | eval temps=mvappend(temp_type_supply + "=" + tostring(temp1), temp_type_return + "=" + tostring(temp2)) | mvexpand temps | rex field=temps "(?<temp_label>.+)=(?<temp_value>.+)" | timechart span=15m avg(eval(tonumber(temp_value))) as avg_temp by temp_label

chart.option: {"Heating Supply": 0xE91E63, "Heating Return": 0x9C27B0, "Hot Water Supply": 0xFF9800, "Hot Water Return": 0xFF5722}

search.query: index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:*, elster:*) earliest=-7d latest=now | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "Heating", sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "Cold Water", 1=1, "Other" ) | eval usage_metric=coalesce(volume, current_value, pulse_count) | bucket _time span=1d | stats latest(usage_metric) as daily_reading by _time, utility | eval date=strftime(_time, "%m/%d") | chart latest(daily_reading) as reading over date by utility

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:*, elster:*) earliest=-7d latest=now | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "Heating", sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "Cold Water", 1=1, "Other" ) | eval usage=coalesce(heat_energy, volume, current_value, pulse_count, power) | eval estimated_cost=case( utility=="Heating" AND isnotnull(heat_energy), heat_energy * 100, utility=="Hot Water" AND isnotnull(volume), volume * 0.08, utility=="Cold Water" AND isnotnull(current_value), current_value * 0.000005, 1=1, 0 ) | timechart span=1d sum(estimated_cost) as daily_cost by utility

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:*, elster:*) earliest=-30d latest=now | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "Heating", sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "Cold Water", 1=1, "Other" ) | eval usage=coalesce(heat_energy, volume, current_value, pulse_count) | eval estimated_cost=case( utility=="Heating" AND isnotnull(heat_energy), heat_energy * 100, utility=="Hot Water" AND isnotnull(volume), volume * 0.08, utility=="Cold Water" AND isnotnull(current_value), current_value * 0.000005, 1=1, 0 ) | stats sum(estimated_cost) as total_cost | eval total_cost=round(total_cost, 2)

search.query: index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:heating, kamstrup:hotwater, elster:coldwater) | eval flow_metric=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating" AND isnotnull(flow), flow * 1000, sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater" AND isnotnull(flow), flow * 1000, sourcetype=="elster:coldwater" AND isnotnull(water_used_last_minute), water_used_last_minute * 60, isnotnull(power), power * 100, 1=1, null() ) | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "ğŸ’§ Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "ğŸš° Cold Water", sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "ğŸ”¥ Heating", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | stats avg(flow_metric) as avg_flow, max(flow_metric) as max_flow, stdev(flow_metric) as stdev_flow, count as sample_count by utility | eval threshold=avg_flow + (2 * stdev_flow) | eval alert_level=case( max_flow > threshold, "âš ï¸ ELEVATED", max_flow > (threshold * 0.75), "âš¡ ELEVATED", 1=1, "âœ… NORMAL" ) | table utility, avg_flow, max_flow, threshold, alert_level, sample_count | eval avg_flow=round(avg_flow, 1), max_flow=round(max_flow, 1), threshold=round(threshold, 1) | sort - max_flow

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:heating, kamstrup:hotwater, elster:coldwater) | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "ğŸ”¥ Heating", sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "ğŸ’§ Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "ğŸš° Cold Water", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | eval leak_value=coalesce(leak_burst, leak_detect) | eval leak_type=case( isnotnull(leak_burst), "Burst/Leak", isnotnull(leak_detect), "Flow Anomaly", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | stats latest(leak_value) as current_status, count(eval(leak_value=1)) as total_leak_events, latest(_time) as last_check by utility, leak_type | eval status=case( current_status=0, "âœ… NO LEAK", current_status=1, "ğŸ”´ LEAK DETECTED", 1=1, "â“ UNKNOWN" ) | eval last_check_time=strftime(last_check, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M") | table utility, leak_type, status, total_leak_events, last_check_time | sort utility

index=utilities sourcetype IN (kamstrup:*, elster:*) | eval utility=case( sourcetype=="kamstrup:heating", "ğŸ”¥ Heating", sourcetype=="kamstrup:hotwater", "ğŸ’§ Hot Water", sourcetype=="elster:coldwater", "ğŸš° Cold Water", 1=1, "âš¡ Energy" ) | stats count as total_events, dc(mqtt_topic) as unique_topics, earliest(_time) as first_event, latest(_time) as last_event by utility | eval data_rate=round(total_events / 60, 1) | eval first_event_time=strftime(first_event, "%H:%M:%S") | eval last_event_time=strftime(last_event, "%H:%M:%S") | table utility, total_events, data_rate, unique_topics, first_event_time, last_event_time | sort - total_events

index=utilities sourcetype=kamstrup:heating | stats latest(heat_energy) as energy_mwh, latest(volume) as volume_m3 | eval efficiency=if(volume_m3 > 0, (energy_mwh * 1000) / volume_m3, 0) | eval efficiency=round(efficiency, 2) | fields efficiency
index=utilities earliest=-1h | stats count as events_last_hour | eval events_per_minute=round(events_last_hour / 60, 1) | fields events_per_minute
index=utilities earliest=-15m | stats dc(source) as gateway_count | fields gateway_count
index=utilities | stats avg(wifi_rssi) as avg_signal | eval avg_signal=round(avg_signal, 0) | fields avg_signal
